Trade/Device Name(s): ImmuLisa Enhanced RNA POL III Antibody ELISA
ImmuLisa™ Enhanced RNA POL III Antibody ELISA
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ImmuLisa Enhanced RNA POL III Antibody ELISA for detection of anti-RNA polymerase III IgG antibodies in human serum
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative or semi-quantitative detection of anti-RNA POL III IgG antibodies in human serum as an aid in diagnosis of systemic sclerosis (scleroderma) in conjunction with other laboratory and clinical findings
